content:
· exact hl₁.trans (l₂.suffix_cons _)
theorem infix_cons_iff : l₁ <:+: a :: l₂ ↔ l₁ <+: a :: l₂ ∨ l₁ <:+: l₂ := by
  constructor
  · rintro ⟨⟨hd, tl⟩, t, hl₃⟩
    · exact Or.inl ⟨t, hl₃⟩
    · simp only [cons_append] at hl₃
      injection hl₃ with _ hl₄
      exact Or.inr ⟨_, t, hl₄⟩
  · rintro (h | hl₁)
    · exact h.isInfix
    · exact infix_cons hl₁
theorem prefix_concat_iff {l₁ l₂ : List α}
